title: Service Review System
description: A full-stack web application that allows users to review and interact with services. It supports user authentication, dynamic CRUD operations, and secure database management.

UserCapabilities: Add/Update/Delete Services with full CRUD operations
View Service Details and user reviews
Manage Reviews with edit and delete options
My Reviews Page for managing user reviews
AuthenticationSystem: Email-password authentication with Google login integration
Secure environment variables for Firebase keys and MongoDB credentials
ExtraFeatures: Search and Filters by keyword and category
Responsive Design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
CountUp Stats for users, services, and reviews

title: Movie Portal [M-Flix]
description: A dynamic platform for movie enthusiasts to explore, add, update, delete, and manage favorite movies. It features authentication, movie search, and dark/light mode toggle for enhanced usability.

Authentication: Firebase authentication with email-password and Google sign-in
MovieManagement: Add and remove movies from favorites
ExtraFeatures: Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Movie search functionality to filter by title
Form validation for movie addition with SweetAlert notifications

Backend: MongoDB for data storage (movies and favorites)
DevelopmentTools: React Hook Form for form handling

title: Eco-Adventure Experiences
description: A blog platform showcasing eco-friendly travel adventures, offering detailed information and expert consultations. It features user profiles, Firebase authentication, and interactive design for an engaging experience.

Design: Fully responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Authentication: Firebase authentication with Google login and email registration
Secure environment with environment variables for Firebase keys
AdventureManagement: Dynamic adventure data displayed using JSON
Adventure detail page with in-depth information
Expert consultation via Google Meet or scheduled messages
ExtraFeatures: Private routes for logged-in users with reload persistence
Profile management for viewing and updating user details
Custom 404 error page with homepage redirect
Dynamic titles based on route changes

Homepage: Adventure cards with title, image, features, and 'Explore Now' button
Additional themed sections to boost engagement
Authentication: Login and registration pages with Google login option
AdventureDetails: Detailed information with Google Meet integration (10 AM - 8 PM)
Profile: User details with options to update name and profile photo
errorPage: Custom 404 page with redirect to homepage

title: Gadget Heaven
description: An e-commerce platform for showcasing and purchasing the latest gadgets. Features include a dynamic cart, wishlist, sorting options, product ratings, and detailed specifications for seamless user interaction.

ProductManagement: Product listing with detailed information including images, price, ratings, and specifications
View detailed product pages with availability and ratings
CartAndWishlist: Add and remove items from the cart or wishlist
Sort products in the cart by price (ascending or descending)
Dynamic calculation of total cost in the cart
Notifications: Real-time alerts and notifications for user actions
InteractiveNavbar: Navigation to Home, Statistics, Dashboard, and Testimonials
Dynamic background color adjustments based on interaction

StateManagement: Context API for global state management

ContextAPI: Global state management for cart, wishlist, and products
ConditionalRendering: Show/hide elements based on user interactions (e.g., toggling cart items)

PurchaseFlow: Simulated purchase flow with modal confirmation upon checkout

title: Select Cricket Team
description: A React-based web application where users can create their dream cricket team by selecting players within a credit limit. Features include credit-based player selection, team management, and instant notifications for team changes.

PlayerSelection: Credit-based player selection where each player has a cost, and users can select players within their available credits
Dynamic updates for remaining credits after each selection or removal
tTeamManagement: Toggle between available and selected players to manage team lineup
Ensure team complies with maximum size constraints
Notifications: Toast notifications for actions like adding/removing players, exceeding credit limits, or reaching maximum team size

StateManagement: PropTypes for type checking of component props

title: Peddy - Pet Adoption Platform
description: Peddy is a pet adoption platform where users can find and adopt pets. It allows filtering by categories, viewing detailed pet information, sorting pets by price, and interacting with adoption modals.

features.CategoryFiltering: Users can filter pets by different categories.
features.PetDetails: Users can view detailed information for each pet including image, breed, price, date of birth, gender, and vaccination status.
features.AdoptionModal: Adoption confirmation modal with a congratulatory message after adoption.
features.PriceSorting: Pets can be sorted by price.
features.ThumbsUpSelection: Users can mark pets with a thumbs-up button.
